fields.title: Whispers of Color
fields.description: A stunning exploration of light and emotion through figurative expressionism. This exhibition showcases the artist's latest works examining themes of feminine power, mythology, and the human condition through rich, luminous oil techniques.

fields.title: Feminine Divine
fields.description: An exploration of goddess mythology across cultures, examining how feminine divine energy manifests in contemporary life. Features new works inspired by Venus, Lilith, and Fortuna.

fields.title: Portraits of Resilience
fields.description: A powerful collection celebrating strength and perseverance through intimate portraiture. Each work tells a story of courage and the human capacity for transformation.
